duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the East Side Costal Resiliency project along the East River in Manhattan, ensuring adherence to construction standards and safety protocols.
Manage and supervise heavy civil construction operations, including sewer, water mains, roadwork, and site work.
Ensure compliance with Local NYC unions, and handle NYCDDC requirements as needed.
Communicate and collaborate with project teams, stakeholders, and subcontractors to achieve project goals and timelines.
Implement comprehensive safety measures and protocols for construction sites, and conduct regular safety assessments.
Utilize strong management and organizational skills to plan, delegate, and coordinate construction activities effectively.
